name: Endless Highway Traffic Chase- City Police Drive Race and Test Free
name_original: Endless Highway Traffic Chase- City Police Drive Race and Test Free
description:
Race has begun with new challenges, are you ready for Endless Highway Traffic Chase?
Pick your favourite city car and drive in the traffic, highways, and two way roads, beside buildings. Speed up your car and reach the destination before the time ends!!

Make sure you don’t hit the other vehicles like bus, truck, car or bike. Don’t clash with other vehicle in heavy traffic.

Upgrade your car by collecting more and more coins.

Get the Nitro energy while racing and speed up your race as much as possible. .

Enjoy the exciting game with 3D graphics and realistic physics around.

Game Features

*Upgrade and customise different cars for racing.
*NEW Realistic racing physics.
*Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views.
*Smooth controls for racing cars.
*Explore different worlds & new missions.

How to Play:-

Tap your iPhone/iPad on your right side to race and control the speed.
Tilt or use arrows to control the car.
